    • 字段详细资料

      • model

        private Index model

      • view

        private IndexView view

    • 构造器详细资料

      • IndexController

        public IndexController()
        Set up Index Controller.

      • IndexController

        public IndexController​(Index model)
        Set up Index Controller with a parameter.
        参数:
        model - A set initiated under Index class, a specific input index.

    • 方法详细资料

      • printVacancy

        public void printVacancy()
        Print vacancy of the model. to print out vacancy of the model.

      • getModel

        public Index getModel()
        Gets model of an index.
        返回:
        An Index representing the index of a model.

      • setModel

        public void setModel​(Index i)
        Sets model of an index.
        参数:
        i - An Index containing the model's index.

      • getView

        public IndexView getView()
        Gets view of an index.
        返回:
        An IndexView representing view of the model.

      • timeClashWithIndex

        private boolean timeClashWithIndex​(Index targetIndex)
        Check whether there is time clash of 2 indexes when student wants to add a course or swap index with peer.
        参数:
        targetIndex - The input index, it is an object of Index class.
        返回:
        A boolean indicating whether there is a time clash.

      • timeClashWithSet

        public Index timeClashWithSet​(Set<Index> indexes)
        Check whether there is time clash of 2 indexes, comparing time slots of target index with all the time slots of the currently registered indexes.
        参数:
        indexes - A set of registered indexes.
        返回:
        A null if there is no time clash

      • editIndex

        public void editIndex​(Set<Index> indexes)
        Edit/update index information. A method under admin. An admin can modify indexes of different courses, e.g, index number, vacancy etc.
        参数:
        indexes - A set of current indexes.

      • printStudents

        public void printStudents()
        Print all students under an input model(index). view calls printStudent under IndexView to print out informaion of students.

      • fixWaitlist

        public void fixWaitlist​(Set<Index> indexes)
        Remove a student from waitlist and add him/her into the index if there is a vacancy available.
        参数:
        indexes - A set of current indexes. Send email to the students when they are removed from a waitlist and successfully get their index.
